Returns the angle (in radians) from the X axis to a point ( y , x ).

 '''Math'''.'''atan2(''' y , x ''')'''

==Parameters==
; x: Required. A numeric expression representing the cartesian x-coordinate.
; y: Required. A numeric expression representing the cartesian y-coordinate.

==Remarks==
The return value is between -pi and pi. It represents the angle of the supplied ( y , x ) point, in radians.

'''Applies To''' : [[javascript/Math|Math Object]]
